name: Blopa
description:
This is our entry for the WeekendGameJam#4 : a 2D puzzle platformer prototype :) 

The theme was : Regeneration.

Oh and don't worry if there is no tree at this end haha, the time was up before we could add it !

Programming & LevelDesign : Me 

Art & GameDesign : Mugiwara

Music : Podington Bear (Free Music Archives)
